Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+2 during combat.

Name: Death Blow 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+4 during combat.

Name: Death Blow 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6 during combat.

Name: Death Blow 4
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+8 during combat.

Name: Darting Blow 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+2 during combat.

Name: Darting Blow 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+4 during combat.

Name: Darting Blow 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+6 during combat.

Name: Darting Blow 4
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+9 during combat.

Name: Armored Blow 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+2 during combat.

Name: Armored Blow 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+4 during combat.

Name: Armored Blow 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+6 during combat.

Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Res+2 during combat.

Name: Warding Blow 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Res+4 during combat.

Name: Swift Sparrow 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd +2 during combat.

Name: Swift Sparrow 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd +4 during combat.

Name: Swift Sparrow 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6, Spd+7 during combat.

Name: Surge Sparrow
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+7 to unit during combat, and also, if unit deals damage to foe using a Special, restores HP = X% of unit's max HP (X = unit's max Special cooldown count value x 20, +10; max 100). (Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

Name: Remote Sparrow
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+7 during combat and reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 30%.

Name: Flared Sparrow
Description: If unit initiates combat, deals 7 damage to foe as combat begins (effects that reduce damage "during comabt" do not apply; will not reduce foe's HP below 1), grants Atk/Spd+7 to unit during combat, and applies 【Divine Vein (Flame)】 on 5 spaces in a line centered on foe's space (oriented left to right based on the direction unit is facing) for 1 turn after combat. 【Divine Vein (Flame)】 Applies the following effects on space: Acts as difficult terrain for foes with Range = 2 (moving over this space costs +1 movement; movement cost cannot exceed unit's allowed movement; "cannot be slowed by terrain" effects do not apply). At start of enemy phase, deals 7 damage to foe, and also, as combat begins, deals an additional 7 damage to foe (effects that reduce damage "during combat" do not apply; will not reduce foe's HP below 1). (Divine Vein effects do not stack; replaces any existing Divine Vein effect; Divine Vein effects applied simultaneously cancel each other out.)

Name: Sturdy Blow 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Def +2 during combat.

Name: Sturdy Blow 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Def +4 during combat.

Name: Sturdy Impact
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6, Def+10 during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: Sturdy Surge
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+7, Def+10 to unit during combat, and also, if unit deals damage to foe using a Special, restores HP = X% of unit's max HP (X = unit's max Special cooldown count value x 20, +10; max 100). (Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

Name: Remote Sturdy
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+7 and Def+10 to unit during combat and reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 30%.

Name: Mirror Strike 1
Description: Grants Atk/Res +2 during combat if unit initiates combat.

Name: Mirror Strike 2
Description: Grants Atk/Res +4 during combat if unit initiates combat.

Name: Mirror Impact
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6, Res+10 during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: Remote Mirror
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+7 and Res+10 to unit during combat and reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 30%.

Name: Steady Blow 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd/Def +2 during combat.

Name: Steady Blow 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd/Def +4 during combat.

Name: Steady Impact
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd +7, Def +10 during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: Swift Strike 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd/Res +2 during combat.

Name: Swift Strike 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd/Res +4 during combat.

Name: Swift Impact
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+7, Res+10 during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: Bracing Blow 1
Description: Grants Def/Res +2 during combat if unit initiates combat.

Name: Bracing Blow 2
Description: Grants Def/Res +4 during combat if unit initiates combat.

Name: Blade Session 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd during combat = 1 + number of allies who have already acted (max value of 3).

Name: Blade Session 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd during combat = 2 + number of allies who have already acted × 2 (max value of 6).

Name: Blade Session 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to unit’s Atk/Spd during combat = 3 + number of allies who have already acted × 3 (min value of 3).

Name: Fierce Stance 1
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk+2 during combat.

Name: Fierce Stance 2
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk+4 during combat.

Name: Fierce Stance 3
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk+6 during combat.

Name: Darting Stance 1
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+2 during combat.

Name: Darting Stance 2
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+4 during combat.

Name: Darting Stance 3
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+6 during combat.

Name: Steady Stance 1
Description: Grants Def +2 during combat when this unit is attacked.

Name: Steady Stance 2
Description: Grants Def +4 during combat when this unit is attacked.

Name: Steady Stance 3
Description: Grants Def+6 during combat when this unit is attacked.

Name: Steady Stance 4
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+8 during combat and inflicts special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Warding Stance 1
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+2 during combat.

Name: Warding Stance 2
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+4 during combat.

Name: Warding Stance 3
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+6 during combat.

Name: Warding Stance 4
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+8 during combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Kestral Stance 1
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd +2 during combat.

Name: Kestral Stance 2
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd +4 during combat.

Name: Kestral Stance 3
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd +6 during combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Sturdy Stance 1
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def +2 during combat.

Name: Sturdy Stance 2
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def +4 during combat.

Name: Sturdy Stance 3
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants. Atk/Def +6 during combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Mirror Stance 1
Description: Grants Atk/Res +2 during combat if foe initiates combat.

Name: Mirror Stance 2
Description: Grants Atk/Res +4 during combat if foe initiates combat.

Name: Mirror Stance 3
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+6 during combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Bracing Stance 1
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res +2 during combat.

Name: Bracing Stance 2
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res +4 during combat.

Name: Bracing Stance 3
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res +6 during combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack).

Name: Swift Stance 1
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Res +2 during combat.

Name: Swift Stance 2
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Res +4 during combat.

Name: Steady Posture 1
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Def +2 during combat.

Name: Steady Posture 2
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Def +4 during combat.

Name: Fierce Breath
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk +4 during combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applies. Does not stack.)

Name: Darting Breath
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd +4 during combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack).

Name: Steady Breath
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+4 during combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Warding Breath
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+4 during combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Name: Distant Def 1
Description: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

Name: Distant Def 2
Description: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

Name: Distant Def 3
Description: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+6 during combat.

Name: Distant Def 4
Description: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+8 and neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Close Def 1
Description: If foe initiates combat and uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

Name: Close Def 2
Description: If foe initiates combat and uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

Name: Close Def 3
Description: If foe initiates combat and uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+6 during combat.

Name: Close Def 4
Description: If foe initiates combat and uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone or beast damage, grants Def/Res+8 and neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

Name: Shield Session 1
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Def/Res during combat = 3 - number of foes who have already acted (min value of 1).

Name: Shield Session 2
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Def/Res during combat = 6 - number of foes who have already acted × 2 (min value of 2).

Name: Shield Session 3
Description: If foe initiates combat, grants bonus to unit’s Def/Res during combat = 9 - number of foes who have already acted × 3 (min value of 3).

Name: Atk/Spd Push 1
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd+3, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

Name: Atk/Spd Push 2
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd+4, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

Name: Atk/Spd Push 3
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd+5, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

Name: Atk/Spd Push 4
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd+7, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 5 damage to unit.

Name: Atk/Def Push 1
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Def+3, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

Name: Atk/Def Push 2
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Def+4, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

Name: Atk/Def Push 3
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Def+5, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

Name: Atk/Def Push 4
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Def+7, but if unit attacked, deals 5 damage to unit after combat.

Name: Atk/Res Push 1
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Res+3, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

Name: Atk/Res Push 2
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Res+4, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

Name: Atk/Res Push 3
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Res+5, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

Name: Atk/Res Push 4
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Res+7, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 5 damage to unit.

Name: Fire Boost 1
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Atk+2 during combat.

Name: Fire Boost 2
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Atk+4 during combat.

Name: Fire Boost 3
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Atk+6 during combat.

Name: Wind Boost 1
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Spd+2 during combat.

Name: Wind Boost 2
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Spd+4 during combat.

Name: Wind Boost 3
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Spd+6 during combat.

Name: Earth Boost 1
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Def+2 during combat.

Name: Earth Boost 2
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Def+4 during combat.

Name: Earth Boost 3
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Def+6 during combat.

Name: Water Boost 1
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Res+2 during combat.

Name: Water Boost 2
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Res+4 during combat.

Name: Water Boost 3
Description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Res+6 during combat.

Name: Fireflood Boost 3
Description: Grants HP+5. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk/Res+7 to unit during combat, and also, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally with HP ≥ 50%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack).

Name: Atk/Spd Form 1
Description: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat (X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3).

Name: Atk/Spd Form 2
Description: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat (X = number of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5).

Name: Atk/Spd Form 3
Description: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat (X = 2 × number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7).
